Today, Dan and Jordan continue their investigation into how [[Alex Jones]] behaved in the immediate aftermath of [[The Sandy Hook Elementary Massacre|Sandy Hook]]. In this installment, Alex has had a few days to regroup after the shock of dealing with the breaking news while on air. Will that affect how he carries himself?
